maqras.text: 15|50|innum niccayamaka en vetanaitan mikka kotiya vetanai
15|51|(napiye!) Iprahimutaiya viruntalikalin varalarrai nir avarkalukku arivippiraka
15|52|Avarkal iprahimitam cenru ‘salamun' (unkalukku iterram untavataka!) Enru kuriyatarku, avar ‘‘niccayamaka nan unkalaip parri payappatukiren' enrar
15|53|atarkavarkal, ‘‘nir payappatatir. Niccayamaka nam umakku mikka nanamutaiya or makan oruvaraik kontu narceyti kurukirom'' enru kurinarkal
15|54|atarkavar ‘‘im'mutumaiyila ninkal enakku makanaik kontu narceyti kurukirirkal!'' Enru kurinar
15|55|atarkavarkal, (‘‘parikacamaka alla) meyyakave nankal umakku (makanaip parri) narceyti kurukirom. (Ataip parri) nir avanampikkaik kollatir'' enru kurinarkal
15|56|atarkavar, ‘‘valikettavarkalait tavira tan iraivanutaiya arulaip parri evantan avanampikkai kollakkutum'' enrar
15|57|(pinnar vanavarkalai nokki, ‘‘iraivanal) anuppappattavarkale! Unkal visayamenna?'' Enru kettar
15|58|atarkavarkal ‘‘(mikapperiya) kurram ceytu kontirukkum makkalitam (avarkalai alittuvita) meyyakave nankal anuppappattirukkirom'' enru kurinarkal
15|59|‘‘eninum, luttutaiya cantatikalait tavira (marra anaivaraiyum alittu vituvom). Niccayamaka nankal avar (cantati)kal anaivaraiyum patukattuk kolvom
15|60|eninum, avarutaiya manaiviyait tavira, niccayamaka aval (antap pavikalutan) tanki vituvalenru nam mutivu ceytuvittom'' (enru iraivan kuriyatakak kurinarkal)
15|61|(iraivanal) anuppappatta (av)vanavarkal luttutaiya kutumpattaritam vantapolutu
15|62|(avarkalai nokki) ‘‘niccayamaka ninkal (nan) ariyata makkalay irukkirirkale!'' Enru avar kurinar
15|63|atarkavarkal, ‘‘(unkal makkalakiya) ivarkal etaic cantekittuk kontiruntarkalo atai nam unkalitam kontu vantirukkirom
15|64|Meyyana visayattaiye nam unkalitam kontu vantirukkirom. Niccayamaka nam (avarkalai alittu vituvom, enru unkalukku) unmaiye kurukirom

15|65|akave, inriravil ciritu neram irukkumpolute ninkal unkal kutumpattinarai alaittukkontu, (avarkal munnum) ninkal pinnumakac cellunkal. Unkalil oruvarume tirumpip parkkatu unkalukku evappatta itattirkuc cenru vitunkal'' enrarkal
15|66|melum, niccayamaka ivarkal anaivarum vitivatarkullakave verarukkappattu vituvarkal enrum nam (avvanavarkal mulamaka) avarukku arivittom
15|67|(itarkitaiyil lut napiyin vittirku valiparkal cilar vantiruppataka arintu) avvurar mikka cantosattutan (lut napiyin vittirku) vantu (kuti) vittanar
15|68|(lut napi avarkalai nokki) ‘‘niccayamaka ivarkal en viruntalikal. Akave, (avarkal munpaka) ninkal ennai ilivu patuttatirkal
15|69|melum, ninkal allahvukkup payantu kollunkal; ennai avamanappatuttatirkal'' enru kurinar
15|70|atarkavarkal ‘‘ulakil yarayiruntalum (ciparicukku) ninkal varakkutatenru nam unkalait tatuttirukkavillaiya?'' Enru kurinarkal
15|71|atarkavar ‘‘ito! En pen makkal irukkinranar. Ninkal (etum) ceyte tiraventumenru karutinal (ivarkalait tirumanam) ceytu kollalam'' enru kurinar
15|72|(napiye!) Um mitu cattiyamaka! Avarkal putti mayanki (valikettil) tattalintu kontiruntarkal. (Atalal, atarku cevi caykkavillai)
15|73|akave, curiyan utittatarku pinnulla nerattai ataintapotu avarkalai itimulakkam pitittuk kontatu
15|74|Accamayam avarkal mitu cenkarkalai poliyac ceytu avarkalutaiya urai talaik kilakap purattivittom
15|75|unmaiyaik kantaripavarkalukku niccayamaka itil pala attatcikal irukkinrana
15|76|niccayamaka avvur (ninkal yattiraikku) varap pokakkutiya valiyiltan (innum) irukkiratu
15|77|niccayamaka itil nampikkaiyalarkalukku oru (nalla) patippinai irukkiratu
15|78|(ivarkalaip polave su'aiputaiya makkalakiya) topputaiyavarkalum niccayamaka aniyayakkararkalakave iruntanar
15|79|akave, avarkalaiyum nam pali vankinom. (Alinta) ivviru (makkalin) urkalum telivana valiyiltan irukkinrana
15|80|(ivvare) ‘hijr' ennum itattilirunta (samutu ennum) makkalum nam tutarkalaip poyyakkik kontiruntanar
15|81|nam avarkalukku namatu (pala) attatcikalaik kotuttiruntum, avarrai avarkal purakkanittuk konte vantarkal
15|82|accamarru valalam enak karuti avarkal malaikalaik kutaintu vitukal amaittarkal
15|83|avarkalaiyum vitiyarkalaiyil (perum) captam pitittukkontatu
15|84|avarkal (tankalai patukattuk kolla) ceytiruntavarril onrume avarkalukkup palanalikka villai

15|85|vanankalaiyum pumiyaiyum, ivarrukku mattiyil ullavarraiyum takka karanaminri nam pataikkavillai. (Napiye! Ivarkalutaiya tantanaikkuriya) kalam niccayamaka varakkutiyate! (Atuvarai ittiyavarkalin visamattai) nir kanniyamana muraiyil purakkanittu varuviraka
15|86|niccayamaka umatu iraivane (anaittaiyum) pataittavan, ivarkal anaivaraiyum) nankarintavan avan
15|87|(napiye!) Niccayamaka nam umakku tirumpat tirumpa otappatakkutiya elu vacanankalai (utaiya ‘al'hamtu' ennum attiyayattai)yum, inta makattana (mulu) kur'anaiyum alittirukkirom

15|88|(Pavikalakiya) ivarkal (ivvulakil) pala vakaikalilum cukamanupavikka ivarkalukku nam kotuttiruppavarrin pakkam nir umatu iru kankalaiyum nittatir; nir ivarkalukkaka kavalaiyum patatir. Eninum, nir nampikkaiyalarkalukku umatu panivana anpaik kattuviraka
15|89|‘‘niccayamaka nan telivana accamutti eccarikkai ceykiravan'' enrum kuruviraka
15|90|(napiye! Munnulla vetankalaip) palavarakap pirittavarkal mitu munnar nam (vetanaiyai) irakkiyavare
15|91|intak kur'anaip palavarakap pirippavarkal mitum (vetanaiyai irakki vaippom)
15|92|(akave,) umatu iraivan mitu cattiyamaka! Avarkal anaivaritamum kelvi kanakkuk ketpom
15|93|avarkal enna ceytu kontiruntarkal enpataip parri
15|94|akave, umakku evappattatai(t tayakkaminri) nir avarkalukku vivarittarivittu vituviraka. Melum, inaivaittu vanankum ivarkalaip purakkanittu vituviraka
15|95|parikacam ceyyum (ivarkalutaiya tinkai vittu) niccayamaka name um'maip patukappom
15|96|ivarkal (um'maip parikacippatu mattuma?) Allahvukku marroru (poyt) teyvattaik kuttakkukirarkal. (Itan palanai) pinnar ivarkal arintu kolvarkal
15|97|(napiye! Um'maip parri) avarkal (kevalamakak) kurupavai umatu ullattai nerukkukiratu enpatai niccayamaka nam arivom. (Atai nir oru ciritum porutpatuttatir)
15|98|nir umatu iraivanait tuti ceytu pukalntu avanukkuc ciram panintu vanankuviraka
15|99|umakku ‘ekin' (ennum maranam) erpatum varai (ivvare) umatu iraivanai vanankik kontiruppiraka
